Title: The Apology
Plot: Jerry's girlfriend walks around his apartment naked; she even eats breakfast and plays Scrabble naked. An old friend of the gang named Jason is going through Alcoholics Anonymous (AA) and is currently working on step 9, where you make amends to individuals for past wrongs. George is anxious to receive Jason's apology for the humiliating neck-hole incident. Elaine is offended when her co-worker, Peggy, can't tolerate Elaine's germs, but easily tolerates the germs of other people. Kramer discovers
GuestStars: John O'Hurley, Patrick Warburton, Megan Cole, Kathleen McClellan, Jack Hackett, Michael Fishman, David Dunard, Wayne Wilderson, Brian Levinson, Eric Simonson, James Spader
